original_text: Then Jeremiah went forth out of Jerusalem to go into the land of Benjamin, to separate himself thence in the midst of the people.
korean_text: 예레미야가 베냐민 땅에서 백성 가운데 분깃을 받으려고 예루살렘을 떠나 그리로 가려 하여

sentences.original_text: Then Jeremiah went forth out of Jerusalem
to go into the land of Benjamin
in the midst of the people
